trans-unit.source: An instance of BookmarkReachedEventArgs is created when the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object raises the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached> event.
trans-unit.target: 何时创建的 BookmarkReachedEventArgs 实例<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>对象引发<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>事件。</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> raises the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached> event when it encounters a bookmark while processing any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>引发<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>事件在处理任一时遇到一个书签时<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>，或<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>方法。</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: To obtain the name and location of the bookmark that triggered the event, access the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs.Bookmark%2A> and the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs.AudioPosition%2A> properties in the handler for the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取的名称和位置的书签的触发了事件，请访问<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs.Bookmark%2A>和<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs.AudioPosition%2A>事件的处理程序中的属性。</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs.AudioPosition%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs.Bookmark%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the time offset at which the bookmark was reached.
trans-unit.target: 获取在已达到书签偏移量的时间。

trans-unit.source: Returns the location in the audio input stream of a synthesis engine when the event was raised.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，返回的合成引擎音频的输入流中的位置。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the bookmark that was reached.
trans-unit.target: 获取已达到书签的名称。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value for the name of the bookmark.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值的书签的名称。
